finch_drone.name: Finch Drone
finch_drone.desc: A basic drone. Not very powerful, but certainly cheap.

finch_drone_flock.name: Finch Flock
finch_drone_flock.desc: A flock of basic drones. Not very powerful, but certainly cheap.

sparrow_drone.name: Sparrow Drone
sparrow_drone.desc: Small drone with point defense capability.

sparrow_drone_flock.name: Sparrow Flock
sparrow_drone_flock.desc: A flock of small drones with point defense capability.
